title: Swamp Thing
summaries: The Swamp Thing is a Hardmode enemy that spawns only during a Solar Eclipse, during which he is about as common as a Zombie. It moves very fast and occasionally stops in place, leaving it vulnerable to attacks. Swamp Things can open doors.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, the Swamp Thing can drop the Broken Hero Sword, an item needed to craft the Terra Blade. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, the Swamp Thing will not drop anything besides coins.
